snippet: The attack at Word of Life Christian Church in New Hartford, N.Y., left Lucas Leonard, 19, dead, and Christopher Leonard, 17, seriously injured.

byline.contributor: Rick Rojas reported from Clayville, and Benjamin Mueller from New York. Nate Schweber contributed reporting from Utica, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and BENJAMIN MUELLER

abstract: New Hartford, NY, authorities say physical assault by members of secretive church on 19-year-old congregant Lucas Leonard and his younger brother Christopher stretched over ten hours; Lucas died of his injuries and Christopher remains hospitalized; authorities say beatings began during meeting called to address concerns that one of the brothers wished to leave church; parents of the teenagers, Bruce and Deborah Leonard, have been charged with manslaughter.

keywords.value: Word of Life Christian Church (New Hartford, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The attack at Word of Life Christian Church in New Hartford, N.Y., left Lucas Leonard, 19, dead, and Christopher Leonard, 17, seriously injured.

headline.print_headline: Conflicting Accounts Emerge on What Set Off Deadly Violence at Upstate Church
headline.main: Plan to Defect Cited in Fatal Beating at New York Church
